title: Book Quest
author: Librarian Sora
pages: If you're looking for books, you're in for a real adventure. Let me guide you through it.
In strongholds, you'll find chests filled with books long forgotten, guarded by stone walls.
Fishing sometimes surprises you with a book among the usual catches.
Woodland mansions can hide books in their winding halls. It's a challenge, but the find is worth it.
And the rumors are true, Lost Libraries brimming with book treasures still exist out there. I've seen them.
